brochureSubtitle: Discover world-class facilities and comfortable accommodations at {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is a premier center dedicated to providing top-tier educational and training environments. We offer a range of facilities, from modern dormitories to fully-equipped conference halls, all designed to foster learning, collaboration, and growth.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure, clean, and well-maintained dormitories perfect for students and trainees.
brochureHallsDesc: A variety of halls and sections suitable for trainings, meetings, and large-scale events.
brochureCateringDesc: High-quality lunch and refreshment services to complement any event.
brochureFeatureWifi: High-speed Wi-Fi access across the campus.
brochureFeatureParking: Ample and secure parking space for all guests.
brochureFeatureSecurity: 24/7 security to ensure a safe and peaceful environment.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more to make your stay productive and comfortable.
brochureWhyChoosePrimeLocation: Prime Location: Easily accessible and situated in a serene environment conducive to learning.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Excellent Service: A dedicated team committed to ensuring your needs are met.
brochureWhyChooseCompetitivePricing: Competitive Pricing: High-quality services at affordable rates.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to Quality: We are dedicated to maintaining the highest standards in all our offerings.
brochureCallToActionDesc: Ready to book or need more information? Our team is ready to assist you. Contact us today!
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your active dormitory booking using your phone number.

pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. It might have been moved or deleted.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services.
faqSubtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.
faqQ1Title: How do I book a dormitory?
faqQ1Answer: You can book a dormitory by navigating to the 'Dormitories' page, selecting an available room for your desired dates, and filling out the booking form. Payment instructions will be provided upon submission.
faqQ2Title: How do companies book a hall or section?
faqQ2Answer: Companies must first register through the 'Register a Company' link. Once the registration is approved by our administration, the company representative can log in to book available halls and sections.
faqQ3Answer: We currently accept payments via direct bank transfer to the account details provided during the booking process. After payment, you must submit proof of payment via our Telegram bot for verification.
faqQ4Title: Can I book multiple halls or sections at once?
faqQ4Answer: Yes, approved company representatives can select multiple halls and/or sections from the 'Halls & Sections' page and book them together in a single transaction.
faqQ5Title: How do I know if my booking is confirmed?
faqQ5Answer: For dormitory bookings, your booking is confirmed once our admin team verifies your payment proof. For facility bookings, your request is first approved by an admin, after which you can proceed with payment and other formalities. You will receive email notifications about your booking status.
faqQ6Title: What are the catering service options?
faqQ6Answer: We offer two levels of lunch and refreshment services for facility bookings. You can choose your preferred level during the booking process, and the cost will be calculated based on the number of attendees and duration of the booking.
faqQ7Title: Who do I contact for support?
faqQ7Answer: For any questions or support, please visit our 'Contact Us' page. You can find contact details for building-specific administrators as well as general inquiries.
